Text: hey these look great, cheers. what mame do you recommend

what mame? 
I would recommend Zsnes the emulator.

Games I recommend are as follows... 

Breath of Fire, Chrono Trigger, Earthbound (RPG) (sorta), Kirby Supa Star! :D, LoZ A Link to the Past, Megaman Series, Secret of Mana, maybe Evermore, Street Fighter series, Mario series, TMNT IV, and Tetris Attack (if your a puzzle fan) 

Those are great, most are classic and popular :D
